Fitzgerald (Ryan Gosling), a disaffected teenager who has apparently murdered a severely retarded peer, the brother of his would-be lover and mentally unstable classmate Laura (Rachel McAdams). Like The Notebook , this movie deliberately paints schizophrenia with bright colors instead of treating it as something actually bad or horrible. This movie is a piece of the time in which it was made..... Realistic. Movies were not candy coated during the late 60s and early 70s. Violence, swearing etc was not edited so what you saw on screen is really what happened or would happen.
The movies like "Madhouse" etc were pretty graphic and told realistic looking stories w a slight comedy element then scanned over to more violence filled revenge action movies.

Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: "Early Years" and "Adult." Early Years picks up the first decade of his life, when Miayzawa made acquaintance with Hinata Takako . Adult depicts his teen years to adulthood days where he went through loneliness but also fell in love again with Miss Moto Oishi
